SA13bsa060_u:1: kaumārye paṭhyatāṃ vidyā śaitye saṃpālyatāṃ ca gauḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2: kṣettraṃ ca karṣyatāṃ pītaṃ trayaḥ suphalahetavaḥ // 1 //
SA13bsa060_u:3: gate 'pi vayasi grāhyā vidyā sarvātmanā budhaiḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:7: guṇini guṇajño ramate nāguṇaśīlasya guṇini paritoṣaḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:12: guṇāḥ kurvanti dūtatvaṃ dūre 'pi basatāṃ satām /
SA13bsa060_u:14: vidvatvaṃ ca nṛpatvaṃ ca naiva tulyaṃ kadācana /
SA13bsa060_u:15: svadeśe pūjyate rājā vidvān sarvatra pūjyate // 8 //
SA13bsa060_u:16: alpastu kālo vividhāśca vidhā ḥ simāyuṣo yā kiyatī? na buddhā /
SA13bsa060_u:17: haṃsā labhante ca yathā payo 'dbhyas tathaiva tatvaṃ labhatāṃ ca yattat // 9 //
SA13bsa060_u:19: vicchedānna hi cāntaraṃ kimapi tat tyājyaṃ na kiṃ tatsthalam /
SA13bsa060_u:20: vaivaśyāddhi viyogato manasi jāyante vidhātā ati
SA13bsa060_u:21: tatsthānaṃ yadi hīyate sahajataḥ syāccātiśāntiḥ sukham //
SA13bsa060_u:24: prapañcā yatnaoto heyāḥ saṃsargaḥ kriyatāṃ satām /
SA13bsa060_u:28: udayantvamūni subahūni mahāmahāṃsi cando cando 'pyalaṃ bhuvanamaṇḍalamaṇḍanāya /
SA13bsa060_u:29: sūryādūte na tadudeti na cāstameti yenoditena dinamastamitena rātriḥ // 14 //
SA13bsa060_u:30: yadudeti vinā sūrya tejasvi tanna jāyate /
SA13bsa060_u:33: mūdhni vā sarvalokasya śīryate vana eva vā // 16 /
SA13bsa060_u:34: vāṇi kaṭhorā bhaṇitā hi duṣṭairyā sarparūpā sujanān hinasti /
SA13bsa060_u:35: te bheṣajaṃ kṣāntimayaṃ ca prajñāṃ saṃsevya cintārahitā bhavanti // 17 //
SA13bsa060_u:37: praviśya vadanaṃ rāhoḥ kiṃ nodeti punaḥ śaśī // 18 //
SA13bsa060_u:40: vanāni dahato vahneḥ sakhā bhavati mārutaḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:41: sa eva dīpanāśāya kṛśe kasyāsti sauhṛdam // 20 //
SA13bsa060_u:46: dūrastho 'pi samīpastho yo yasya manasi sthitaḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:48: pareṣāṃ vaibhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā mano yasya prakupyati /
SA13bsa060_u:49: na tasyārthopalabdhistu citaṃ puṇyaṃ ca naśyati // 24 //
SA13bsa060_u:50: rāgopamaṃ nāsti malaṃ hi loke īrṣyopamā nāsti ca kāpi hāniḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:51: yāñcāsamo nāsti ca ko 'pi bandhurdānopamo nāsti ca mitravargaḥ // 25 //
SA13bsa060_u:52: kṣudhāsamā nāsti śarīravedanā cintāsamā nāsti śarīraśoṣaṇā /
SA13bsa060_u:53: guṇaiḥ samā nāsti śarīrabhūṣaṇā kṣāntyā samaṃ nāsti śarīravarmaṃ vai // 26 //
SA13bsa060_u:54: dhanena kiṃ kṣudrajanasya mitraiḥ kiṃ vañcakasyāpi ca matsarasya /
SA13bsa060_u:55: kiṃ hānidasyātiguṇagrahaiśca kiṃ vā vipattau vimukhātmajena // 27 //
SA13bsa060_u:56: sarvathā svahitamācaraṇīyaṃ kiṃ kariṣyati jano bahujalpaḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:57: bidyate hi na sa kaścidupāyaḥ sarvalokaparitoṣakaro yaḥ // 28 //
SA13bsa060_u:58: prasaṅgasyānukūlo yaḥ prajña eva sa pālayet /
SA13bsa060_u:59: satyāsatye ca maitridveṣau kuryāt svaparaiḥ saha // 29 //
SA13bsa060_u:60: na dviṣantaḥ kṣayaṃ yānti yāvajjīvamapi ghnataḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:61: krodhameva tu yo hanti tena sarve dviṣo hatāḥ // 30 //
SA13bsa060_u:65: prajñā hrāso na yāvaddhi tāvatkuryāt svayaṃ hitam // 32 //
SA13bsa060_u:66: vyabhicāreṣvāsattaḥ rājā tasya hi nirakṣaro mantri /
SA13bsa060_u:67: tadā dhanāśā kutra rakṣyā asavaḥ prayatnena // 33 //
SA13bsa060_u:71: kākaścālayet pākaṃ vastūnāṃ tatra kā kathā // 35 //
SA13bsa060_u:73: puṣpaṃ puṣpaṃ vicinvīta mūlocchedaṃ na kārayet // 36 //
SA13bsa060_u:74: valmīkaṃ madhujātaṃ ca śuklapakṣe ca candramāḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:76: hīnatā yācane yatra syāttatra na ca yācyatām /
SA13bsa060_u:77: kāmaṃ hi na bhavedindro himājjīvati tittariḥ // 38 //
SA13bsa060_u:78: mayūra ! grīṣmasya tu tāpayukta āśāyutaḥ khasya jale bhavestvam /
SA13bsa060_u:79: kaṇṭhantu no nāmaya gauraveṇa nīre taḍāgasya tu dūṣitasya // 39 //
SA13bsa060_u:80: siṃho balī hariṇaraktapāmāṃsabhojī saṃvatsareṇa kurute ratimekavāram /
SA13bsa060_u:81: yo gardabhaḥ khalu rajaḥkaṇamātrabhojī kāmī bhavedanudinaṃ vada ko 'tra hetuḥ //
SA13bsa060_u:83: sarpāḥ pibanti pavanaṃ na ca durbalāste śuṣkaistṛṇairvanagajā balino bhavanti /
SA13bsa060_u:84: kandaiḥ phalairmunivarā gamayanti kālam saṃtoṣa eva puruṣasya paraṃ nidhānam // 41 //
SA13bsa060_u:85: sa śobhate puṣpitapuṣpavacca sumaṇḍitaṃ yasya mukhaṃ suvarṇaiḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:86: anakṣaraṃ yasya mukhaṃ bhavecvet tannetravaktre bhubi chidravacca // 42 //
SA13bsa060_u:87: muktāmaṇibhyāṃ ca hi gardabhasya kiṃ śūkarasya priyabhojanena /
SA13bsa060_u:88: andhasyadīptyā badhirasya gītaimūrkhasya dharmeṇa kimasti kṛtyam // 43 //
SA13bsa060_u:93: kṣatiṃ bihāya yenāpi prayogeṇa hitasya kim /
SA13bsa060_u:97: kāmāturāṇāṃ na bhayaṃ na lajjā kṣudhāturāṇāṃ na balaṃ na tejaḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:98: rogāturāṇāṃ na sukhaṃ na nidrā mārgāturāṇāṃ na bhayaṃ na vīryam // 48 //
SA13bsa060_u:99: dhanalipsuḥ suhrit tyājyā bhāryā ca vyabhicāriṇī /
SA13bsa060_u:100: adharmī ca nṛpaḥ krūro mantrī piśuna eva ca // 49 //
SA13bsa060_u:101: kupradeśo hi durvyavasāyo duṣṭo 'tha vai suhṛt /
SA13bsa060_u:102: baidyo 'dakṣo 'pi duḥsevyam vastu heyā ime 'pi ca // 50 //
SA13bsa060_u:108: aho ! susadṛśī ceṣṭā tulāyaṣṭeḥ khalasya ca // 53 //
SA13bsa060_u:109: yathā bāryo na laśunasya gandhaḥ kastūrikācandanacandrasaṃjñaiḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:110: tathā na vāryā varaśāstraśikṣābhyāsena duṣṭasya ca duṣṭatāpi // 54 //
SA13bsa060_u:112: maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpaḥ kimasau na bhayaṅkaraḥ // 55 //
SA13bsa060_u:114: nyūne śaradi nīre hi nadīṃ sarve taranti ca // 56 //
SA13bsa060_u:117: duṣṭā narā bhṛtyagaṇo 'vamānī praśikṣitā naiva hayāḥ kubhāryā /
SA13bsa060_u:118: pratāḍanenaiva bhavanti namrāḥ sukarmayogyā na kadāpi caite // 58 //
SA13bsa060_u:119: vṛthā vṛṣṭiḥ samudrasya vṛthā tṛptasya bhojanam /
SA13bsa060_u:120: vṛthā dānaṃ samarthasya vṛthā hīnasya satkṛtiḥ // 59 //
SA13bsa060_u:121: padmāni satputramukhe lasanti rohanti nūnaṃ kulaṭāsutasya /
SA13bsa060_u:122: viṣasya patrāṇi yathā karoti duṣkarma yo vai labhate phalantat // 60 //
SA13bsa060_u:123: abhracchāyā khale prītiḥ siddhamannaṃ ca yoṣitaḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:125: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ striyo vṛddhā madyaṃ ca taruṇaṃ dadhi /
SA13bsa060_u:126: nakte bhojo divā svāpaḥ ṣaḍete prāṇahāriṇaḥ // 62 //
SA13bsa060_u:129: kāntāviyogaḥ svajanāpamāno ṛṇasya śeṣaḥ kunarasya sevā /
SA13bsa060_u:131: karmī hyalābhī balino 'pakartā darpī ca bhikṣurhyadhanaḥ sukhārthī /
SA13bsa060_u:139: yācakaḥ svādubhoji ca darpī bhikṣāparo bhavet /
SA13bsa060_u:141: sakṛjjalpanti rājānaḥ āryo hi dṛśyate sakṛt /
SA13bsa060_u:154: na dṛśyate tena gṛhe tu patnyāḥ kāmādimithyācaraṇaṃ kukṛtam // 76 //
SA13bsa060_u:156: pāre gatasya kiṃ nāvā kāntayā kiṃ virāgiṇaḥ // 77 //
SA13bsa060_u:158: gūḍhe vacasi bhojye 'sti prīti pṛthagjanasya ca // 78 //
SA13bsa060_u:159: śaile śaile na māṇikyaṃ mīne mīne na mauktim /
SA13bsa060_u:160: sādhavo he na sarvatra candanaṃ na vane vane // 79 //
SA13bsa060_u:161: haṃso na bhāti caturo bakayūthamadhye gomāyumaṇḍalagato na vibhāti siṃhaḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:162: jātyo na bhāti turagaḥ kharayūthamadhye vidvān na bhāti puruṣeṣu nirakṣareṣu // 80 //
SA13bsa060_u:166: vinītāya ca śāntāya janāya kā sahiṣṇutā // 82 //
SA13bsa060_u:172: aṅkamāruhya suptasya hantuḥ kiṃ nāma pauruṣam // 85 //
SA13bsa060_u:173: kaumāre pitarau pātaḥ bhartrī rakṣati yauvane /
SA13bsa060_u:175: āsaktirna bhaveddyāvat tāvattu guṇa eva saḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:180: bālaḥ payasā dagdho dadhyapi phūtkṛtya bhakṣayati // 89 //
SA13bsa060_u:187: śiṣṭā na gṛhṇanti purā pratijñāṃ gṛhṇanti cet te kaṭhinapratijñām /
SA13bsa060_u:188: aṅgikṛtāṃ tāṃ paripālayanti pāṣāṇarekhāmiva te tadānīm // 93 //
SA13bsa060_u:189: prāpnoti vittaṃ hyadhamo ti kiñcid garvī pareṣāmavamānanāyām /
SA13bsa060_u:190: saṃjāyate labdhadhanaḥ sumartyaḥ supakvadhānyena samaṃ vinamraḥ // 94 //
SA13bsa060_u:195: guṇā guṇajñeṣu guṇā bhavanti te nirguṇaṃ prāpya bhavanti doṣāḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:196: susvādu toyāḥ prabhavanti nadyaḥ samudramāsādya bhavantyapeyāḥ // 97 //
SA13bsa060_u:199: alpā dṛḍhā ye mṛdubhāṣiṇaśca tebhyo 'vadhānaṃ karaṇīyameva /
SA13bsa060_u:200: niryāti sūryaḥ saghanāddhi meghāt syāt tatprakāśastu tadātitīkṣṇaḥ // 99 //
SA13bsa060_u:201: śāntipriyāḥ syuḥ khalu yauvane 'pi vaiduṣya evaṃ vinatā bhaveyuḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:206: upekṣate tatra sukhaṃ na ceha janaḥ prapātastha ivāsti cāndhaḥ // 102 //
SA13bsa060_u:207: ye kleśarogiṇo bhuktvā na ca saddharmabheṣajam /
SA13bsa060_u:208: pramattā viṣayāsaktā bhavābdhiṃ na taranti te // 103 //
SA13bsa060_u:212: śvastanaṃ cādya kuryācca pūrva madhyāhnikaṃ varam // 105 //
SA13bsa060_u:216: sato jīvanamanto vā varaṃ tvākheṭakasya na // 107 //
SA13bsa060_u:218: gātheyaṃ bhāratīyopādhyāyavinayacandreṇa bhoṭadeśīya lokacakṣu bhikṣuṇā dharmaprajñenānūditā nirṇītāceti /
